actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize a United States payment for fiscal year 1975 to the United Nations for expenses of the United Nations Force in Cyprus.
short_title: United Nations Force in Cyprus Act

summary.text: United Nations Force in Cyprus Act - Authorizes appropriations of $4,800,000 for fiscal year 1975 for payment by the United States towards the costs of the United Nations force in Cyprus.

titles.title: United Nations Force in Cyprus Act
A bill to authorize a United States payment for fiscal year 1975 to the United Nations for expenses of the United Nations Force in Cyprus.
